topic.title: Auto-Failover
topic.shortdesc: Automatically marks a node as failed over if the node is identified as unresponsive or unavailable

body.p: The timeout before the auto-failover process starts when a cluster node failure is detected.

To enable Auto-Failover:
Check the Enable auto-failover check box
To set the delay in seconds before auto-failover is started, enter the number of seconds in the Timeout box. The default timeout is 120 seconds.
